SENT.plain: We report our experience of lengthening by over 30% a total of 117 lower limbs in achondroplastic patients
We have compared four methods: transverse osteotomy, oblique osteotomy, callotasis of the shaft and chondrodiatasis of the epiphysis
Chrondrodiatasis of the femur and callotasis of the tibia are the techniques which gave fewest complications
